article:
Jack is a 25-year-old man. He works in a great factory far from his home. He is crazy about playing computer games at night and so he never gets up early. He is always  _  for work. He always  _  why time always goes so fast.
Today is also a  _  day for him. He got up late again. He looked at his clock. He looked at his  _  around his wrist . They both said 7:10. He had to leave in 10 minutes. But  _  he had to shave . Then he had to brush his teeth. Then he had to get dressed. It  _  him about 5 minutes to do these things. So he turned  _  the TV. He turned off the radio, too. It was already 7:25. He put his breakfast in a bag. He  _  locked the door. He had to hurry. He ran out to his  _ . He drove fast. A cop  saw him. He stopped Jack, "Why didn't you stop at the stop sign?" the cop asked. "But officer, I was in a  _ ," he said. "But I had to be in a hurry too or you have passed me already. Here's your third ticket this week." said the cop.
